verbs.description: sweet chili orange chicken [ARG0: my husband] [V: loves] [ARG1: this simple sweet chili chicken dish] [ARGM-EXT: so much] he often requests it when he comes home from deployment the sweet chili sauce adds just the right amount of heat to the bright citrusy sauce —jessica eastman bremerton washington
